column4: I'm trying to run an executable (freeware game, Cave Story), and when I run it by clicking on it in Nautilus it works fine, but trying to run it from terminal or from an application launcher, it opens then immediately closes
running from terminal yields no error messages unfortunately
it might have to do with the directory it's launched from.
I'm not sure, but it's possible that when double-clicking on an executable, Nautilus launches it within the folder it's in.
